Blackbaud - AcademicWorks Team | Austin, TX | 2 days onsite & 3 days remote | Full-time

AcademicWorks is a small team within Blackbaud that builds a scholarship solution. Our current tech stack is primarily Ruby on Rails, but we have also started adopting Elixir. We are entirely hosted on AWS and use Postgres, Cassandra, ElasticSearch & Redis to make the magic happen. We are looking to add another Mid-Career or Senior Software Engineer to help us keep shipping new features and entirely new products.

Email catherine[dot]oneill[at]blackbaud[dot]com for more information.
